title: Build module and dependency inventory
description: Create a service/library inventory and dependency map derived from the root pom and module directories.
acceptance_criteria: Inventory doc `docs/review/module-inventory.md` lists all modules in root `pom.xml` <modules> and top-level `basebackend-*` directories, with zero missing/extra entries.
review_initial_requirements: Confirm module list matches `pom.xml`; capture dependency edges between services and shared libraries; note any cyclic or unclear ownership.
review_regression_requirements: Re-run inventory after updates; verify dependency map still consistent and changes are documented.
notes: picked_reason:foundation module inventory for downstream reviews;done_at:2026-01-18T14:23:40+08:00;validation_limited:doc-only change, no automated tests run;manual_test:open docs/review/module-inventory.md and compare lists to pom.xml and top-level basebackend-* dirs;evidence:module-inventory.md generated; list check script ok;risk:low doc-only update

title: Audit documentation and build index
description: Compile a docs index and gap list from existing reports and README references.
acceptance_criteria: Docs index `docs/review/document-index.md` lists all files under `docs/` and root README references; missing/obsolete references are identified in a gap list with file-level pointers.
review_initial_requirements: Check README references vs `docs/`; mark stale or missing docs; ensure index includes recent reports.
review_regression_requirements: Re-scan after updates; confirm no unresolved missing docs remain.
notes: picked_reason:doc index aligns with existing report structure;done_at:2026-01-18T14:25:47+08:00;validation_limited:doc-only change, no automated tests run;manual_test:open docs/review/document-index.md and confirm docs list and gap list match repo state;evidence:document-index.md generated; docs list check ok;risk:low doc-only update

title: Review core module contracts and conventions
description: Assess security, gateway, messaging, observability, cache, and database modules for consistent cross-module contracts and shared conventions.
acceptance_criteria: Review notes in `docs/review/core-module-consistency.md` cover each listed module; inconsistencies are logged with impacted module and suggested resolution.
review_initial_requirements: Check auth propagation, error model, logging standards, and shared DTOs across modules.
review_regression_requirements: Verify fixes or follow-up tasks address each logged inconsistency.
notes: picked_reason:core consistency check after inventory/index;done_at:2026-01-18T14:28:28+08:00;validation_limited:doc-only change, no automated tests run;manual_test:review docs/review/core-module-consistency.md against module review reports;evidence:core-module-consistency.md created with gateway response inconsistency noted;risk:low doc-only update

title: Review runtime config and infra dependencies
description: Assess config sources and infrastructure dependencies across environments, including docker compose, Nacos env templates, and Sentinel rules.
acceptance_criteria: Config review checklist in `docs/review/config-infra-review.md` identifies config sources, required env vars, and mismatches; each dependency has owner and environment notes.
review_initial_requirements: Verify secret handling and override order; confirm docker compose and config templates align.
review_regression_requirements: Validate updates against deployment templates; ensure no config drift.
notes: picked_reason:config/infra review based on nacos and compose sources;done_at:2026-01-18T14:30:35+08:00;validation_limited:doc-only change, no automated tests run;manual_test:review docs/review/config-infra-review.md against config/nacos and docker compose docs;evidence:config-infra-review.md created with env var and mismatch checklist;risk:low doc-only update

title: Review data and integration boundaries
description: Validate database usage, message contracts, and file service interfaces for compatibility and resilience.
acceptance_criteria: Integration boundary matrix in `docs/review/data-integration-review.md` covering DB, MQ, and file service; contract gaps and retry/timeout strategy documented.
review_initial_requirements: Check schema ownership, topic naming, serialization formats, and error handling per integration.
review_regression_requirements: Confirm remediation items have validation steps or tests defined.
notes: picked_reason:boundary review for DB/MQ/file integrations;done_at:2026-01-18T14:31:57+08:00;validation_limited:doc-only change, no automated tests run;manual_test:review docs/review/data-integration-review.md against cited sources;evidence:data-integration-review.md created with contract gap list;risk:low doc-only update

title: Review security and sensitive configuration
description: Assess JWT handling, auth policies, gateway filters, and secret management for insecure defaults and policy gaps.
acceptance_criteria: Security review checklist in `docs/review/security-review.md` with findings for JWT secrets, token expiry, whitelist policies, and gateway filters; remediation list created.
review_initial_requirements: Validate secret sources, rotation strategy, and auth propagation across gateway/services.
review_regression_requirements: Confirm mitigations are documented and aligned with current configs.
notes: picked_reason:security config review before quality summary;done_at:2026-01-18T14:33:17+08:00;validation_limited:doc-only change, no automated tests run;manual_test:review docs/review/security-review.md against gateway/security configs;evidence:security-review.md created with JWT/gateway findings;risk:low doc-only update

title: Consolidate quality and test status
description: Summarize current quality posture using existing reports and sonar config; define regression scope.
acceptance_criteria: Quality summary `docs/review/quality-test-summary.md` includes gaps list and regression matrix referencing existing reports and `sonar-project.properties`.
review_initial_requirements: Validate report recency and coverage; highlight missing test types.
review_regression_requirements: Confirm regression matrix covers critical services and flows.

title: Publish review conclusions and prioritized backlog
description: Compile final action backlog with priorities, milestones, and validation steps mapped to modules.
acceptance_criteria: Action backlog `docs/review/action-backlog.md` lists items with priority, module, acceptance criteria, and verification plan; sign-off recorded.
review_initial_requirements: Ensure priorities reflect risk/impact and dependencies; confirm owner fields are ready for assignment.
review_regression_requirements: Cross-check backlog against review docs; ensure no critical gaps.
